subject: Ang: Re: [junit] j2eeunit + weblogic 5.1 + JSPRedirector
msgSnippet: Hi! As you probably noticed I didn t get a great deal of response from the News group... ... however I have finally managed to sort it out myself. First
messageBody:
Hi!

As you probably noticed I didn't get a great deal of response from the News
group...

... however I have finally managed to sort it out myself.

First problem solved was j2eeunit.properties setting for JSPRedirector.
Simply:
j2eeunit.jspRedirectorURL = http://localhost:7001/redirector.jsp.

Nothing is required in the weblogic.properties file.

Next problem was a Weblogic 5.1 bug which was resolved after installation
of SP8.

Now my JspTestCase is running fine.

Hope this helps.

Steven Hale, wm-data, Sweden
